actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Retirement Act to authorize the retirement of employees after 25 years of service without reduction in annuity.

summary.text: Authorizes the retirement of civil service employees after twenty-five years of service without reduction in annuity. Provides that any civil service employee who is involuntarily seperated from the service, exept for removal on charges of misconduct, shall be entitled to a reduced annuity after becoming 50 years of age and completing twenty years of service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Retirement Act to authorize the retirement of employees after 25 years of service without reduction in annuity.
